alert.note: Alert for Trumbull (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 08 at 7:38AM EST until March 08 at 7:28PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Cleveland OH has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Ohio... Mahoning River At Warren affecting Trumbull County. For the Mahoning River...including Leavittsburg, Warren, Youngstown...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mahoning River At Warren. * WHEN...From this morning to this evening. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, River is out of banks, southern portions of South Park Road threatened. Flooding can be expected at Walnut and Beaver, along South Park Avenue and along Hayden Street. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:30 AM EST Tuesday the stage was 9.8 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage late this morning to 10.1 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage this afternoon to 3.7 feet and begin rising again early Saturday afternoon. It will rise to 3.8 feet Saturday evening. It will then fall again and remain below flood stage. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 11.0 feet on 05/23/2004. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon by 545 PM EST.
